medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient scheduled for laparoscopic radical prostatectomy for prostatic adenocarcinoma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient had no significant symptoms prior to surgery but became tachycardic approximately 3 hours into anesthesia, with subsequent moderate metabolic acidosis observed in blood gas tests.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of uneventful, bilateral inguinal hernia repair under general anesthesia. Recently treated for gastric ulcer and diabetes.
medical_history.family_history: Family history not relevant to current disorder.
